name: Reeling It In
description:
Use the connection between the character and your mouse to move through the level as fast as possible! But be careful, if your mouse collides with the character or you sever the connection, you have to restart! Made in two days for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

(Level 8 is pretty hard)

Controls:

  • Move mouse  - Move reel
  • Hold left click - Reel character in
  • Escape - Exit to menu
